resources.string:
Technorio is an Independent Software Vendor that provides you different IT services
 as per your requirement. We provide different services including Software and 
 Application Development, Visual Story Telling, ICT Consultancy Service and all other 
 ICT related Solution.
“Technology is anything that wasn’t around when you were born.” \n\n – Alan Kay (Computer Scientist)

Technorio is a Nepal Based leading Software and IT Company.
 We offer you with an intelligent, lucid and authoritative filter for the overwhelming flood of information about technology.
 We believe, with technology we can transcend traditional boundaries.
 At Technorio; we’ve expertise on Web Solutions, Software and Application Development and all sorts of IT related solutions. 
 We also offer IT consultancy services to different corporate, organization and offices. We talk to you to find out what you need. 
 We don’t pay any attention to the competition, for they’re not relevant to us. Our only concern is to provide you the best service that you can trust and rely upon.
 We talk to our valued customers and see how we can assist them to meet their objectives as their technology partners.
